attributes.action: Car tax to be payable in instalments
attributes.additional_details:
Most insurances and household bills, for example TV Licence, Car Insurance, Telephone Bill etc can be paid in monthly installments which helps people to budget.

Car tax, however, has to be paid in full which can put a strain on finances for some people, especially those on low incomes.

This petition is for the government to allow car tax to be paid monthly.
